select s.*,sl.id sampleLogId,so.order_no orderNo, sl.create_date updateDate from tb_sample s left join tb_sample_log sl on s.sample_id=sl.sample_id left join tb_sample_order so on s.order_id=so.id where sl.exper_state=#{experState} and sl.user_id=#{userId} and s.state=#{state} and sl.state=#{state} order by updateDate desc
